title: AI Godfather says CS degrees matter, but mid-level programmers might be replaced by AI soon
description: Geoffrey Hinton, the ‘Godfather of AI’, says that while artificial intelligence is rapidly reshaping the software industry, a computer science degree still holds significant value. However, Hinton warns that mid-level programming roles may not remain secure for much longer.
content: The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence is reshaping the tech industry at bottleneck speed. Many companies are already automating several work areas including the process of writing code. And this is raising questions whether holding a degre... [2737 chars]

title: Powering Brunei’s AI future

title: America's AI race success depends on winning the energy race first: expert
